title: Avira System Speedup 2.6.1.2751 + Crack [4REALTORRENTZ]

It has a System Cleanup module which contains a complete set of tools that swiftly and safely clear out PC clutter. Recover significant amounts of wasted space with a Junk Files Cleaner, Registry Cleaner and Smart Defragmenter. Activate the Privacy Cleaner to clear out the data downloaded in your everyday web browsing. File Encryption keeps current files on lockdown against prying eyes, while the File Shredder and Disk Wiper ensure that deleted items cannot be recovered. The Uninstaller allows no remnants of removed applications to waste space on your machine or cause errors in the future.

The Startup Manager speeds up boot time by limiting the number of tasks performed while Windows loads. Disk Doctor finds, diagnoses and repairs hard disk errors. The Disk Analyzer checks for opportunities to improve disk space usage. For preventive care, the Drivers monitor keeps track of the software that links your operating system to your hardware, reducing the risk of hardware failure.
